metadata.name: Application AppID Uri Configuration Changes
metadata.comment: Detects when a configuration change is made to an applications AppID URI.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(LOWER(message)) in ('update application', 'update service principal'))

output.summary: Detects when a configuration change is made to an applications AppID URI.

metadata.objective: False positive: When and administrator is making legitimate AppID URI configuration changes to an application. This should be a planned event. Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-applications#appid-uri-added-modified-or-removed
